programme.title: Space: The New Frontier: Next Stop Mars
programme.desc: Mars has fired our imagination for thousands of years. The tantilizing possibility of life has made it the most inviting planet in our solar system. It is the only other place that man may one day call home.

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier: The Inner Worlds
programme.desc: They orbit between our planet and our star. Mercury and Venus make up half of our terrestrial planets, but we still know very little about them. As we take a closer look at our companions, we find more questions than answers.

programme.title: Earth Shocks

programme.desc: Dan Ball brings the political headlines by interviewing news makers of the day, including politicians, lawmakers, pundits, celebrities and social media influencers.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We like appetizers that deliver big flavor without much work. This means spiced nuts that are not overly sweet, spinach dip that is bold and creamy (not watery and insipid), and beef satay that is tender and vibrant.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Most cooks are under the impression that good soup takes all day to prepare. We'll show you how to make simplified versions of two favorite soups: chicken noodle and Italian pasta and bean.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Soup for supper is an appealing concept, especially on a cold night. But for soup to work as a main course, it better be hearty. Our vibrant lentil soup fits the bill, and we round out this meal with quick cheese bread.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Some local dishes become so popular that they transcend their region. Gumbo is a taste of Louisiana in a big old bowl. And Cincinnati chili is American original, served with buttered spaghetti, kidney beans, cheddar cheese, and chopped onions.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: It sometimes seems the simplest recipes suffer the worst fate in modern cookbooks. The test kitchen was committed to breathing new life into these old-fashioned American recipes: stuffed pork chops, gravy, and glazed carrots.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We offer two inspired takes on roast chicken. Our roast lemon chicken ends with a twist. And there's nothing conventional about cooking a butterflied chicken under a brick. But these two recipes both deliver crisp skin and lots of flavors.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Quick and easy weeknight cooking can still yield great results. We start with two quick-cooking classicsâ€” sautÃ©ed chicken cutlets and pan-seared shrimpâ€”and elevate them from the everyday.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we offer delicious, relatively straightforward fare that appeals to young and old. What kidâ€”or adultâ€”doesn't look forward to macaroni and cheese or barbecued chicken?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We take some of our favorite restaurant recipesâ€”Crab Towers and FlambÃ©ed Pan-Roasted Lobsterâ€”and show you how to make them work in a home kitchen.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Huge meaty flavorâ€”combined with spice, smoke, and fireâ€”epitomizes Texas barbecue. Could we figure out how to make authentic Texas beef ribs in our Boston-based test kitchen?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: On occasion, we break the bank and buy a beef tenderloin. The tender, buttery interior is the big draw, and the combination of a healthy dose of seasoning and the flavor from the grill is a perfect solution to an otherwise mild-tasting piece of meat.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we prepare grilled chicken with a sweet-and-sour dipping sauce and grilled salmon with a sweet, sticky glaze.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we prepare chicken enchiladas and Mexican rice.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Sure, raw tomato sauces are fast, but if the sauce is watery and bland, who cares? Likewise, asparagus-based pasta sauces are often bland and boring. In this episode, we keep things simple while avoiding these common problems.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen prepares two Indian favorites: chicken biryani and mulligatawny soup.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: PissaladiÃ¨re is ProvenÃ§al street food, a fragrant, pizza-like tart prized for its contrast of salty black olives and anchovies against a backdrop of sweet caramelized onions and thyme. We figure out how to make a great version of this French classic.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Too often, eggplant Parmesan is a soggy, oily mess. And pasta with chicken and broccoli is heavy and bland. But after many tests in the kitchen, we've come up with recipes that give these simple, honest dishes the respect they deserve.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Pasta all' amatriciana is perhaps Rome's most famous dish. Despite the fancy name, it's nothing more than long-strand pasta sauced with tomatoes, onion, bacon, and hot pepper flakes and dusted with cheese. We show you how to master this simple dish.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Our goal was simple: Take French onion soup and baked goat cheese salad and make stellar versions of these bistro favorites.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: A sticky bun should be neither dense nor bready, neither saturated with butter nor so sugary that it makes your heart race. The crumb should be tender and feathery and the sticky glaze gently chewy and gooey. Here's how we made ours.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Brownies are too often dull, and blondies (as well as congo bars, their coconut-flavored cousins) can be even worse, since they are even plainer. We decided to keep things simple while focusing on developing superior flavor and texture.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Cakes baked in Bundt and tube pans are popular for a variety of reasons. These pans make cakes that are especially attractive, and the cakes themselves tend to be pretty simple to prepare. In this episode, we make angel food and a chocolate Bundt cake.
programme.sub-title: There's a Hole in Your Cake

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We wanted to develop the perfect pumpkin cheesecake recipe, but we never figured it would take 30 cheesecakes to develop a great recipe worthy of the finest holiday dinner.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Watch as we take two modern classic desserts â€”a chocolate volcano cake and caramelized pearsâ€”and make them approachable for the home cook.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Our hearty frittata is just as filling as an omelet, but a whole lot easier to prepare and serve. We also uncover the formula for the ideal quiche filling and deliver a tender, buttery pastry crust filled with moist, smooth custard.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we look at a few of our favorite Tex-Mex dishes: tomato salsa, quesadillas, and beef tacos.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen shows you how to make two hearty soups: black bean and tortilla.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: What could be more synonymous with fall than butternut squash? In this episode, we explore two main-course squash recipes: a creamy, comforting soup perfect for serving on a busy weeknight and a rich, hearty risotto suitable for entertaining.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We investigate inexpensive steaks and find out which were worth eating and how best to prepare them. We also take a look at a classic accompaniment to steak: mashed potatoes.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: When most people think of dishes like lasagna and jambalaya, they think of labor-intensive weekend meals. In this episode, however, we develop versions that could be prepared on a busy weeknight.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Two old-fashioned dishes with modern appeal: Boston baked beans and chicken and dumplings. Neither requires fancy ingredients or expensive equipment, just a little time and effort.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: What's for Sunday dinner? Around many American tables, it's meat and potatoes. Beef brisket is a good choice and a nice change from pot roast or beef stew. Although inexpensive and simple to prepare, brisket does pose some challenges to the cook.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: There are certain dinners we rely on again and again. We are particularly fond of roasting chicken and potatoes together in one pan. While the chicken roasts, its juices drip onto the potatoes, giving them a wonderfully rich crust and creamy flavor.

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

programme.title: Room 237
programme.desc: Stanley Kubrick's classic film, 'The Shining,' gets a riveting and in-depth exploration of its hidden meanings, dazzling puzzles, and even conspiracy theories.

programme.title: When We Were Kings
programme.desc: A documentary of the 1974 heavyweight championship bout in Zaire, 'The Rumble in the Jungle,' between champion George Foreman and underdog challenger Muhammad Ali.

programme.title: Cooley High
programme.desc: Set in 1964 Chicago, "Cooley High" is a slice-of-life tale of two high school students--best friends--coping with the challenges of everyday life and growing up in the shadows of the housing projects. Glynn Turman and Laurence-Hilton Jacobs star.

programme.title: Paris Blues
programme.desc: Ram (Paul Newman) and Eddie (Sidney Poitier) are two expatriate jazz musicians living in Paris, where their music is celebrated. When they fall in love with two vacationing American girls, they must decide if they should move back to America with them.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier and Rod Steiger (who won a Best Actor OscarÂ® for his performance) shine in this classic mystery-thriller that took home five Academy AwardsÂ®, including Best Picture and Best Adapted Screenplay. Lee Grant and Warren Oates also star.

programme.title: Inherit the Wind
programme.desc: Spencer Tracy and Fredric March go toe-to-toe in this powerful recreation of a titanic courtroom battle in which an attorney faces off against a fundamentalist in a Tennessee town where a teacher has been brought to trial for teaching Darwinism.

programme.title: Castles of Horror
programme.desc: Castles on various frontiers include Bodiam Castle, Chepstow Castle and Dover Castle.

programme.title: Castles: Britain's Fortified History
programme.desc: Sam Willis traces the history of the British castle from its first appearance in 1066.

programme.title: Castles: Britain's Fortified History

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Blanc focuses on tomatoes, opening with a simple salad recipe inspired by his mother; he also makes a creamy risotto, stuffed tomatoes glazed with cheese and a series of ices and sorbets to cleanse the palate with elegance.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Blanc celebrates the best of British shellfish as he cooks dishes including Moules Mariniere, seared squid salad and Scottish lobster.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Raymond begins with a feather-light lemon tea cake, coated in an apricot jam and tangy lemon glaze; he also makes a choux pastry filled with chocolate cream and covered with a chocolate icing; lastly, the secrets to the perfect macarons.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Blanc shares his favorite lamb dishes: lamb liver with caramelized potatoes and French seasoning, a slow-roasted garlic and herb lamb shoulder with potato and turnip gratin and lamb provencal with ratatouille.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Raymond celebrates his passion for puddings, cooking dishes including riz au lait, tarte tatin and fruit crumble.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Raymond shares his love of charcuterie, beginning with thin slices of duck cured in herbs and juniper berries; also, he makes a chicken liver parfait and a meaty pot-au-feu medley; lastly, a ham hock terrine served with home-made pickles.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Drawing upon his travels through Asia, Raymond creates dishes full of fragrant spice and fiery heat.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Raymond demonstrates the versatility of the summer's juiciest fruits with a simple but impressive berry-strewn pavlova and a spicy cherry clafloutis sees the vibrant fruit cushioned in a bed of soft, sumptuous pastry.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Raymond celebrates the freshest summer greens, beginning with a simple yet vibrant pistou soup, laden with summer vegetables and bursting with basil, topped with crispy croutons and meltingly rich parmesan.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Raymond Blanc creates four mouth-watering chocolate recipes: a simple mousse, rich chocolate delice, fondant with a melting middle, and his signature dessert: cafe creme, which is a chocolate-sculpted cup filled with a mousse and coffee sabayon.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: The miracle of yeast helps Raymond to create a French classic: brioche; he gets down to basics with a French country bread recipe that's essential for any baker to add to their repertoire; lastly, he makes a spectacular apple croustade.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Raymond Blanc combines the universally popular ingredients of egg and cheese to make a classic omelette with a secret technique; he then uses a Comte from his home region in France to make a family-style souffle.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The illustrious grand final begins with the biggest battle in Robot Wars history. The second and third place robots from the heats will battle it out in a fight to the death to determine who will be the 6th and final robot in the grand final.

programme.title: Robot Wars World Series
programme.desc: Former champions Apollo, Sabretooth, Terrorhurtz and Gabriel 2 take on a true legend, the highly flammable Diotoir. Making up the Rest of the World team are TMWHK from the Netherlands, Cobra from Belgium and Rabid M8 from Portugal.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Learn more about this infamous Robot and the family that built it. With an unforgettable design and devastating weapon, the Hypno-Disc competitor became an instant icon.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Debuting in the Second Wars, to becoming the most successful Robot ever to take part in Robot Wars. The Razer Robot put the squeeze on all the competition, including the House Robots.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The teams are Donald Thump, Behemoth, Sabretooth, Apollo, Apocalypse and The Swarm. Along the way they must dodge arena hazards, menacing house robots and the all-new Fog of War.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Returning champions Carbide mount their title defence against some of the toughest machines in the competition. They will have to fight through brutal group battles and nightmarish knockout rounds to make it to the heat final.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Competing in this heat are: Apex, Vulture, Terrorhurtz, Track-Tion, Bucky the Robot and Rapid. The battles are all overseen by judges Professor Noel Sharkey, Professor Sethu Vijayakumar and Dr Lucy Rogers.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The fourth heat features an experienced roboteer fighting to secure his legacy, a new wave spinner and a powerful crusher. Competing through group battles for a place in the final are Iron-Awe 6, The Kegs, Tauron, Nuts 2, Concussion and Androne 4000.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: This round determines which of the fighting machines makes it into the grand final, along with the final two robots to compete in the Ten Robot Rumble. Thor, Coyote, Expulsion, Hobgoblin, Push to Exit and Magnetar battle it out.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The illustrious grand final begins with the biggest battle in Robot Wars history. The second and third place robots from the heats will battle it out in a fight to the death to determine who will be the 6th and final robot in the grand final.

programme.title: Robot Wars World Series
programme.desc: Former champions Apollo, Sabretooth, Terrorhurtz and Gabriel 2 take on a true legend, the highly flammable Diotoir. Making up the Rest of the World team are TMWHK from the Netherlands, Cobra from Belgium and Rabid M8 from Portugal.

programme.title: Robot Wars World Series
programme.desc: Reigning champions Eruption lead a team of some of the fiercest robots in the UK, Big Nipper, Concussion and Thor all fighting for international glory. Their opposition are captained by silicon valley millionaire Michael Mauldin and robot Cathadh.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: More mechanical mayhem as teams of roboteers do battle to become king of the scrap heap.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The second round of heats sees eight new robots join the fight for The Seventh Wars title. Growler is de-muzzled as he rampages through the arena in the four-way melees, no-one is safe.

programme.title: Martha Cooks
programme.desc: Martha and her niece Sophie visit their favorite tea shop, Arogya, in Westport, Conn., to discover the do's and don'ts of making tea; they return to Martha's kitchen to create dishes with tea.

programme.title: Martha Cooks
programme.desc: Martha visits Mast Market in Mt. Kisco, N.Y., and learns the art behind making their renowned chocolate; from roasting cacao, to stone grinding, to forming delicious bars and chips.

programme.title: Martha Gardens
programme.desc: Martha's new passion project is the maze she's building on her Bedford farm; she shares her plans and inspiration for the project and teaches the proper measuring, staking and fertilizing techniques to properly plant successful trees.
programme.sub-title: Martha's Amazing Maze and How to Grow Trees From Seedlings

programme.title: Martha Gardens
programme.desc: Martha shows how to properly move an established tree on her very own Christmas tree farm; she gives a tour of her pinetum where she teaches about new and unusual conifer trees.
programme.sub-title: Everything You Need To Know About Conifers

programme.title: Martha Gardens
programme.desc: Martha brings the outdoors inside the home and shares her love of houseplants; she shows how to take care of the most popular houseplants and how to propagate them to create new plants.

programme.title: Martha Gardens
programme.desc: Martha explores how to care for succulents including watering, fertilizing, and repotting.

programme.title: Martha Gardens
programme.desc: Martha takes us inside her vegetable greenhouse to see how she has turned her harvest into a year-round bounty; she collects, stores, and sows seeds, and makes her perfect green drink.
programme.sub-title: Inside Martha's Vegetable Greenhouse; Seed Starting

programme.title: Martha Gardens

programme.title: Street Fighter II: The Animated Movie
programme.desc: M. Bison, leader of the international crime syndicate Shadowlaw, is recruiting the world's greatest fighters. Bison targets Japanese fighting master Ryu, who possesses gravity-defying fighting abilities.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: In this anime spinoff of the sci-fi television series, Takeru has been sent from a distant planet to destroy the earth. However, as he learns of the beauty of the earth and its inhabitants, he begins to question his mission.

programme.title: A Wind Named Amnesia
programme.desc: In this anime classic, a powerful wind has left all memories erased. Two years later, a young man travels on a journey to find the truth about the apocalyptic wind.

programme.title: Project A-Ko
programme.desc: Superhuman high schooler, A-ko, must set aside her rivalry with her genius classmate, B-ko, to save earth from evil alien invaders.

programme.title: Project A-Ko 2: Plot of the Daitokuji Financial Group
programme.desc: Three weeks after the alien ship landing on Graviton City, A-ko and the gang go on summer vacation. Meanwhile, chaos breaks out when B-ko's father arms the local military with new mecha to attack the alien ship.

programme.title: Project A-Ko 3: Cinderella Rhapsody
programme.desc: While working part-time at a fast food joint, A-ko falls for the mysterious Kei. While B-ko happens to like him as well, both of them are unaware that C-ko is the apple of Kei's eyes.

programme.title: Project A-Ko 4: Final
programme.desc: While A-ko and B-ko's rivalry over Kei intensifies over a surprise marriage proposal, another alien fleet is headed on its way towards Earth.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love
programme.desc: Ultimate thief Lupin III has a new target: the lost gold of the Romanov dynasty! With the help of a mysterious blonde named Judy Scott, Lupin discovers the treasure hidden in Texas, at the Bank of Liberty.

programme.title: Sound! Euphonium: The Movie Welcome To The Kitauji High School Concert Band [Japanese-Language Version]
programme.desc: A recap movie of the first season of Sound! Euphonium (2015).

programme.title: Sound! Euphonium: The Movie May The Melody Reach You! [Japanese-Language Version]
programme.desc: A recap movie of the second season of Sound! Euphonium (2015).

programme.title: Labyrinth
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: The Code
programme.desc: A veteran thief (Morgan Freeman) recruits a younger crook (Antonio Banderas) to help him pull off one final job in order to repay his debt to the Russian mob.

programme.title: A Haunted House
programme.desc: When Malcolmâ€™s (Marlon Wayans) girlfriend moves into his house, he soon discovers the love of his life is possessed by an evil spirit. Malcolm enlists the help of Father Williams (Cedric the Entertainer) to exorcise the demon from his girlfriend.

programme.title: The Negotiator
programme.desc: The tables turn when a seasoned hostage negotiator takes hostages and risks all to prove his own innocence.

programme.title: Peacock
programme.desc: A train accident in rural Nebraska gradually unveils a mystery involving the town's bank clerk. Starring: Cillian Murphy, Ellen Page, Susan Sarandon

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: In order to protect a woman from a robber, a male FBI agent disguises himself as an elderly woman.

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: A former thief frantically searches for his missing daughter, who has been kidnapped and locked in the trunk of a taxi. Starring Nicolas Cage and Malin Akerman.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal
programme.desc: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

programme.title: The Wind in the Willows - Original Movie
programme.desc: Toad, Rat, Mole and Badger follow animal etiquette in this version of Kenneth Grahame's classic, in stop-motion model animation.

programme.title: To the Ends of Time
programme.desc: In a mythical kingdom, a young boy must fight time itself for the love of his princess and the future of his land.

programme.title: Scales
programme.desc: Mermaids are real! Siren has lived her whole life thinking she's an ordinary girl, but on the eve of her 12th birthday she learns that she is destined to become a mermaid. She must say goodbye to her entire life as she transitions into the water.

programme.title: Windstorm
programme.desc: Rebel teen Mika encounters a beautiful, wild stallion named Windstorm at her grandmother's riding school and learns she can communicate with horses.

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.desc: A raven-haired enchantress, Cassie Nightingale, mysteriously moves into the local haunted mansion, 'Grey House', and seems to change her neighbors lives using a hint of magic causing many to think sheâ€™s a witch.

programme.title: George And The Dragon
programme.desc: A knight (James Purefoy, "Rome") returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon after the disappearance of the kindly Princess Lunna (Piper Perabo, "Coyote Ugly"). With Patrick Swayze.

programme.title: The Simple Life of Noah Dearborn
programme.desc: Academy Award winners Sidney Poitier and Dianne Wiest star with Mary-Louise Parker in this enchanting tale about a quiet hero who becomes the talk of the town.

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: Experience the magical world of 'The Secret Garden' as never before in this beautiful production of the classic tale. When her parents are lost in a tragic accident, Mary must seek comfort in the strange and forgotten corridors of Misselthwaite Factory.

programme.title: Storm Boy
programme.desc: When Michael Kingley, a successful retired businessman starts to see images from his past that he can't explain, he's forced to remember his childhood and how, as a boy, he rescued and raised an extraordinary orphaned pelican, Mr Percival.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Bluefin Beatdown
programme.desc: An old rivalry re- ignites after a fight at the dock between captains Tyler McLaughlin and Dave Carraro, of FV- tuna.com, while a crewmember fights to keep his job on the Hot Tuna.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Harpoon Hellraising
programme.desc: It's week four of the North Atlantic Blue Fin Tuna Season and oneveteran Gloucester captain has yet to catch his first fish, while two rival harpoon boats go head to head.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Go Hard or Go Home
programme.desc: It's week five of Gloucester's Bluefin tuna fishing season, and when a sudden storm engulfs the fleet, each captain must decide if the risk of staying out on the water is worth the reward.

programme.title: Bent Rods and Broken Hearts
programme.desc: It's week six of the North Atlantic Bluefin tuna fishing season and the Gloucester fleet's underdogs struggle to turn around their seasons.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Maine Event, The
programme.desc: It's week seven of the North Atlantic Bluefin tuna fishing season, Gloucester captains must decide whether go where the fish are biting or take their chances fishing inshore.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Battle At Midway
programme.desc: It's week eight of the Atlantic bluefin tuna season, the midway point of fishing where crews either knuckle down and push hard, or crumble from the grind.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Wicked Pissed
programme.desc: It's week nine of the North Atlantic bluefin tuna season and Captain Paul Hebert, struggles to prove his worth as a captain after catching only three tuna in the first two months of fishing.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: When Push Comes to Shove
programme.desc: It's week ten of the North Atlantic bluefin tuna season in Gloucester, Massachusetts, and, with only six weeks of fishing left, the competition is heating up.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Threeâ€™s a Charm
programme.desc: It's week 11 of the North Atlantic Bluefin tuna season, and bad luck, bait problems and big egos plague the Gloucester fleet.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Triple Crossed
programme.desc: It's week 12 of the North Atlantic Bluefin tuna season, and one captain's decision to withhold information fractures ties with an important ally.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Tuna Trifecta
programme.desc: It's week 13 of the North Atlantic Bluefin tuna season and, with only three weeks left to fish, and the number one position on the line, every Gloucester captain is desperate to stack the deck with bluefin.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Knock Out Punch
programme.desc: It's week 14 of the Bluefin tuna season and with less than two weeks of fishing left, the top four Gloucester crews are locked in a tight race to be New England's best Bluefin boat.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Bait and Switch (Finale Part 1)
programme.desc: It's the final week of the season and Hard Merchandise holds a narrow lead over the fleet

programme.title: Wicked Tuna
programme.desc: There are less than five days left before the Atlantic Bluefin Tuna season in Gloucester, Massachusetts closes and the competition will come downto the very last day of fishing

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Masters of Bluefin (Special)
programme.desc: Take a look back at the best moments from previous seasons as the top fishermen of Gloucester, Massachusetts, battle for supremacy while they pursue the elusive Atlantic Bluefin Tuna

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: First Blood
programme.desc: It's the first day of the new Bluefin tuna fishing season in Gloucester, Massachusetts, and every captain in the fleet wants to the land the coveted first tuna of the year.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Anchor Anger
programme.desc: The rivalry between captains Dave Carraro and Tyler McLaughlin intensifies, while other boats in the fleet push to bring new mates up tospeed in the North Atlantic Bluefin fishing season.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Bluefin Beatdown
programme.desc: An old rivalry re- ignites after a fight at the dock between captains Tyler McLaughlin and Dave Carraro, of FV- tuna.com, while a crewmember fights to keep his job on the Hot Tuna.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Harpoon Hellraising
programme.desc: It's week four of the North Atlantic Blue Fin Tuna Season and oneveteran Gloucester captain has yet to catch his first fish, while two rival harpoon boats go head to head.

programme.title: The Brief with Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNN's reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Anchor Erin Burnett presents information beyond the regular headlines by providing objective reports on top issues along with compelling interviews, lively debates and in-depth analysis of situations.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper 360
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper brings his prickly but often witty perspective to current events and personalities in the news. He is joined by a series of guests that frequently include political and legal analysts.

programme.title: The Source With Kaitlan Collins
programme.desc: Kaitlan Collins chases the facts, asks the tough questions and connects with her sources on prime time to break down the day's biggest news stories.

programme.title: CNN NewsNight With Abby Phillip
programme.desc: Abby Phillip delivers a smart, sharp approach to the day's biggest stories.

programme.title: Laura Coates Live
programme.desc: Laura Coates discusses the daily intersections of politics, pop culture and the law.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: A rotating cast of anchors and contributors present daily headlines and breaking stories live from CNN headquarters in Atlanta.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: Highlights and action from the world's sporting competitions.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: A rotating cast of anchors and contributors present daily headlines and breaking stories live from CNN headquarters in Atlanta.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Join Christiane Amanpour as she provides her powerful interview skills and provocative analysis on global stories that matter to you.

programme.title: Early Start
programme.desc: Get a jump on the day's news with Kasie Hunt.

programme.title: CNN This Morning
programme.desc: The hosts present some of the most important news stories, reports and happenings of national and international significance.

programme.title: CNN News Central
programme.desc: The latest news from around the world live from CNN's immersive news hub with John Berman, Kate Bolduan and Sara Sidner.

programme.title: Connect the World

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: Highlights and action from the world's sporting competitions.

programme.title: Connect the World
programme.desc: Presenting a journey across the continents to explore all the varied landscapes and cultures. Thus, making this world more connected.

programme.title: 20th Century Women
programme.desc: 20th Century Women is a poignant love letter to the people who raise us â€“ and the times that form us â€“ as this makeshift family forges fragile connections that will mystify and inspire them through their lives.

programme.title: Living
programme.desc: Bill Nighy stars as a humorless bureaucrat in 1950s London who decides to take time off work to experience life following a grim diagnosis.

programme.title: 5 Flights Up
programme.desc: When long-time married couple Ruth (Diane Keaton) and Alex (Morgan Freeman) decide to move away from New York City, they must contend with eccentric open house guests, their pushy realtor niece, and the health of their beloved family dog.

programme.title: My Week With Marilyn
programme.desc: An assistant on the set of THE PRINCE AND THE SHOWGIRL documents the week he spent befriending Marilyn Monroe (Michelle Williams) and helping her escape the pressures of fame and Hollywood.

programme.title: Living
programme.desc: Bill Nighy stars as a humorless bureaucrat in 1950s London who decides to take time off work to experience life following a grim diagnosis.

programme.title: Another Round
programme.desc: In this Oscar-winning dramedy starring Mads Mikkelsen, four middle-aged teachers embark on an experiment to see if maintaining a constant level of alcohol in their blood can lead to greater freedom and happiness. Subtitled.

programme.title: Mandela: A Long Walk to Freedom
programme.desc: Golden Globe-Winner Idris Elba stars in this moving of Nelson Mandela, the jailed activist who became President of South Africa and helped rebuild the once-segregated society.

programme.title: What They Had
programme.desc: Bridget returns home at her brother's urging to deal with her ailing mother and her father's reluctance to let go of their life together.

programme.title: The Way
programme.desc: Martin Sheen ("The Departed") stars as a father who recovers the body of his estranged son who died traveling the "El Camino de Santiago" and decides to take the pilgrimage himself.

programme.title: The Poison Rose
programme.desc: Inspired by classic film noir, "The Poison Rose" stars Carson Phillips, an ex-football star turned PI, who's got a soft spot for a lady in distress.

programme.title: Kickboxer 5: Redemption
programme.desc: A retired kickboxer goes on a mission to avenge the brutal death of his promising young student. Revenge is not easy, however, as the target of his wrath is a leader of an underworld kickboxing league.

programme.title: Notorious nick
programme.desc: Based on the inspiring true story of Nick Newell, this thrilling underdog tale portrays a mixed martial arts fighter born with a partial left arm and his unstoppable desire to succeed.

programme.title: DOA: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, a martial-arts tournament. Four female rival fighters, an aristocratic warrior, a wrestling superstar, an athlete with a tragic past, and an assassin-for-hire, work together to uncover a secret.

programme.title: Notorious nick
programme.desc: Based on the inspiring true story of Nick Newell, this thrilling underdog tale portrays a mixed martial arts fighter born with a partial left arm and his unstoppable desire to succeed.

programme.title: DOA: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, a martial-arts tournament. Four female rival fighters, an aristocratic warrior, a wrestling superstar, an athlete with a tragic past, and an assassin-for-hire, work together to uncover a secret.

programme.title: DRAGGED ACROSS CONCRETE
programme.desc: Police partners descend into the criminal underworld after they are suspended for assaulting a suspect on video.

programme.title: Man from Shaolin
programme.desc: Chinese martial arts star Li Zhang drives the action as a renowned Shaolin Fighting Monk, who relocates to America to protect his young orphan niece in this powerful kung fu fight fest.

programme.title: The Pledge
programme.desc: The night he retires as a Nevada sheriff, Jerry Black (Nicholson) pledges to the mother of a murdered girl that he will find the killer.

programme.title: Wilde Wedding, The
programme.desc: While preparing for her wedding to husband number four (Patrick Stewart), a retired film star (Glenn Close) invites husband number one (John Malkovich) and their collective families to a summer weekend in the country.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: A self-absorbed realtor (Michael Douglas) enlists the help of his neighbor (Diane Keaton) when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.

programme.title: My Mom's New Boyfriend
programme.desc: Henry Durand (Colin Hanks) is a young FBI agent who is given a difficult assignment: spy on his mother (Meg Ryan) and her boyfriend (Antonio Banderas) who is suspected of leading a gang of art thieves.

programme.title: My Blind Brother
programme.desc: A slacker (Nick Kroll) and his blind athlete brother (Adam Scott) compete for the love of the same woman (Jenny Slate) in this hilarious comedy.

programme.title: My Mom's New Boyfriend
programme.desc: Henry Durand (Colin Hanks) is a young FBI agent who is given a difficult assignment: spy on his mother (Meg Ryan) and her boyfriend (Antonio Banderas) who is suspected of leading a gang of art thieves.

programme.title: My Blind Brother
programme.desc: A slacker (Nick Kroll) and his blind athlete brother (Adam Scott) compete for the love of the same woman (Jenny Slate) in this hilarious comedy.

programme.title: Wharf Rats
programme.desc: A wharf rat discovers an old family secret that might help him get everything he ever wanted in life - beer, girls, and a fishing boat.

programme.title: The Big Divorce
programme.desc: Mike Christian is a happily married man who runs into his high school sweetheart Alex and sparks still fly. Mike is determined Alex is his true soul mate, but he signed an iron-clad pre-nuptial agreement and his wife will not let him out of the marriage.

programme.title: Meet The Patels
programme.desc: An Indian-American man who is about to turn 30 gets help from his parents and extended family to start looking for a wife in the traditional Indian way.

programme.title: Lovesick
programme.desc: Charlie has everything: a great job, friends, family, the whole package. However, he doesn't have love.

programme.title: Where Your Heart Belongs
programme.desc: When a NY marketing executive returns home to help with her best friend's wedding, she learns the hard way that the love and support of family and friends means more than she'd ever imagined.

programme.title: 10 Truths About Love
programme.desc: A thriving romance columnist thinks she has her love life figured out, until her long-time boyfriend breaks up with her. At the same time, her editor hires a new writer to collaborate on her column, and sparks begin to fly as they clash.

programme.title: Yes, I Do
programme.desc: Busy chocolatier Charlotte has left helicopter mechanic James at the altar two times, and now she needs to prove to him that she really does want to marry him.

programme.title: Hearts In the Game
programme.desc: A NYC publicist helps an MLB pitcher find his way back to the game and to her heart.

programme.title: Appetite for Love
programme.desc: A corporate executive is sent to a small town to re-brand a restaurant as part of a strategic acquisition, but the iconic diner happens to be in her home town where she hasn't been in years.

programme.title: Wedding Planner Mystery CA
programme.desc: Carnegie Kincaid is a wedding planner and a perfectionist in both work and romance. When a murder occurs and a bride is kidnapped surrounding the wedding of a prominent family embroiled in a high profile fraud scandal.

programme.title: The Perfect Pairing
programme.desc: Influential and anonymous food and wine critic Christina slips on ice and falls while visiting a winery â€” and no one knows who she is. Single father Michael and his family take her in to help her jog her memory.

programme.title: Wedding Every Weekend
programme.desc: Nate and Brooke are going to the same four weddings, four weekends in a row. To avoid set-ups, they go together as 'wedding buddies'. But what starts as a friendship soon becomes deeper.

programme.title: Unexpected Grace
programme.desc: When lonely young Grace finds a note from a schoolgirl looking for a friend, she excitedly writes back, setting off a chain of events that ultimately changes the lives of three people.

programme.title: Wedding Season
programme.desc: Journalist Trish is on back-to-back bridesmaid duty for her three best friends. Finding herself without a date, she pairs up with photographer Ryan, the brother of her best friend.

programme.title: Autumn in the City
programme.desc: Optimistic Piper gives herself two months to find her passion in New York City. As she bounces between temp jobs, she and her jaded neighbor discover the beauty of the city together.

programme.title: Christmas Festival of Ice
programme.desc: When Emma finds out that her beloved ice-sculpting contest, part of her hometown's Christmas festival, has been canceled, she springs into action.

programme.title: When Christmas Was Young
programme.desc: In desperate need of a hit song, a headstrong music manager finds himself falling for a gifted singer-songwriter who abandoned her dreams of making it big.

programme.title: A Snow Capped Christmas
programme.desc: When champion figure skater Claire becomes injured she is sent to a rehabilitation center in the snowy mountains where she meets and falls for a local ice fisherman who shows her there is more to life than competition.

programme.title: The Most Colorful time of the Year
programme.desc: Ryan is a elementary school teacher, who learns that he is colorblind. Michelle, an optometrist and mother of one of his students, helps bring color into his life in time for the holidays.

programme.title: A Gift Wrapped Christmas
programme.desc: A personal shopper Gwen's newest client, Charlie, is a high-rolling, workaholic, single father.

programme.title: The Christmas Pact
programme.desc: Hailee, a well-known entertainment reporter for a network morning show, is humiliated when her oft-absent investment banker fiancÃ©, Jason is revealed to be linked to a Beverly Hills socialite.

programme.title: Swept Up By Christmas
programme.desc: An antique seller and a cleaner clash over how to downsize a magnificent estate right before Christmas.

programme.title: With Love, Christmas
programme.desc: Melanie Welch is a hard-working ad executive who finds herself teamed up with uptight coworker Donovan Goodwin to come up with the ultimate Christmas commercial for a new cell phone.

programme.title: The Christmas Doctor
programme.desc: Zoey is a traveling doctor who prefers short assignments to staying put, so when she is assigned to a small town clinic for the holidays, she is surprised when she starts to feel at home.

programme.title: A Fabled Holiday
programme.desc: Talia and her childhood best friend Anderson unexpectedly reunite in a familiar looking town full of Christmas spirit that restores its visitors during their times of deep turmoil.

programme.title: The Santa Stakeout
programme.desc: Tanya is a police detective who is reluctantly partnered with fellow detective Ryan to solve a recent string of heists taking place during high-profile holiday parties around town. They go undercover as newlyweds...

programme.desc: A pet-shop customer returns his dead parrot; a gang of female senior citizens attacks a town's young men; a young army officer who joined the service to water-ski tries to resign.

programme.desc: Rob, Steelo, and Chanel laugh till it hurts at Unnecessary Combos, people who should Stay out of the water, and others who just plain wonder Who Put That There? Karate expert Matthew Mounce helps break down some Bad Karate.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Producer Jeff Tremaine joins Rob in breaking down what it means to Lawnchair and Slam and Sprint. Some kids start slamming young in Ridiculousness in Training, and Rob points out Your Friend's a Dick.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Beauty Queen Caite Upton joins Steelo on the panel. Rob breaks down the magic of Man-kinis and Dodging Bullets. Guest Matt Schlager demonstrates how to fall with your face first and hands second, in Getting Schlagered.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob's cousin Drama helps Rob break down Family Dysfunction, Your Friend's a Dick, and Little Rollers. Credit Cards compete for pain against Popsicles. And learn whether Parkour is an art or just some Aggressive Running.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Bull rider Judd Leffew schools Chanel on whether bulls get dizzy when Rob breaks down A Bunch of Bull and Angry Animals. Watch fools compete in the Ridiculousness Decathlon. And a whole lot of people get Dunked.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Caite Upton joins Steelo once again as Rob shows off S**t Whips and Redneck Good Times. A lot of people blow out their money-makers in De-Faced. Biker Fox joins the panel for some fun in spandex and scrapes in Biker Down.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: TV star Ryan Dunn joins the fun as Rob points out the problems with Lower Education. See some folks who are clearly Out of Your League while others get slammed in That's What You Get and Let Me Help You Hurt Yourself.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob breaks down Why Rollerblading Should Make a Comeback. Witness a merry-go-round of pain in Worst Case Scenario, Almost Made It and Not Even Close. And guest unicyclist Dan Heaton shows off some Uni-Psychos.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Learn How Not to Treadmill and why Grass is Your Friend. See a wake of damage after Trees Strike Back. Guest dancer Cole Hernandez brings some Weird Dancing. Some skaters get Racked. Rob narrates Chicken Police.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: The Dingo is back! Laugh as a whole lot of people have a Tough Day on the Job, find out if You're Too Old For That, and who's Almost Awesome. Rob breaks down Skiers vs. Snowboarders. Shoes go flying off in Shoe Down.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Big Black is back and he's showing off Black Lavender. See what happens When Bad Ideas Go Worse and people suffer a Failure to Launch. Rob's got a special category that only comes once: You Couldn't Do That Again if you Tried.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Justin Bieber stops by the set to show off some of his Canadian pride, learn about Humanimals and what Popcorning is really all about.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Floyd Mayweather visits the Ridiculousness studio where Rob shows him what a Pain Face looks like. They'll also endure some Romantic Injuries and learn How Not To Train.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Former "PMOY", Sara Jean Underwood, visits the Ridiculousness set where Rob shows off his Fear Face and they talk about how Cats are Weird.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: UFC fighter & former champion, Quinton "Rampage" Jackson, shows his wolf battle cry and what really sets off his Hot Button. Rob also shows videos of Crappy Endings and what it's like to get Slampaged.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Ace of Cakes star chef, Duff Goldman, stops by set with a scorpion cake and we see some of his Unnecessary Costumes. He and Rob also show videos of Grand Entrances and Ghost Holes.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Australian-born actor and radio personality, Jason Ellis, shows us he is an expert at Showing Off Gone Wrong when the introduction of Tramp Stamp videos earns him a surprise payback from Chanel.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob and co-hosts, Chanel and Sterling, breakdown the fun of Redneck Good Times and introduce new categories: Random Tackles, Animal Revenge, Dropping Loads, and many more.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob dedicates Whisky Throttle and Bear Trap videos to Nitro Circus stunt man, Streetbike Tommy. Tommy also tells us why you should always Bring Your Own Chair.

programme.title: The Secret world of Herbs
programme.sub-title: The Secret World of Herbs - In Latin America
programme.desc: Healing effects, fragrance, and intense flavor â€“ the benefits of herbs were discovered by the indigenous peoples of South America long before Spanish conquistadores subdued the continent. Even today, in the remote regions of South America, life without herbs is unthinkable. For many inhabitants, they provide the sole medicine. For more than two thousand years, this wisdom of the healing powers of nature has been passed down from generation to generation. In Bolivia, the film accompanies ethnobiologist Rainer Bussmann on one of his expeditions documenting which herbs the locals use against which illnesses. The German scientist has spent the last 15 years in the region, focussed on preserving this invaluable knowledge.

programme.title: The Secret world of Herbs
programme.sub-title: The Secret World of Herbs - In the Alps
programme.desc: Secluded for many centuries in inaccessible valleys, the inhabitants of the Alps had no alternative but to rely on the healing powers of nature. A knowledge of herbs was deeply rooted in these mountain-dwellersâ€™ everyday lives â€“ until the twentieth century, when this wisdom became eclipsed by modern academic medicine. Today, Alpine herbs are witnessing a revival, as public interest in regional natural treasures grows. The potential of Alpine herbs is far from exhausted. In the Berchtesgaden Alps, the film shows Hubsi Ilsanker at work as a root-digger, a back-breaking job that has scarcely changed in four hundred years. Authorized by a special historic permit to supply the oldest gentian distillery in Germany, Hubsi digs for protected gentian roots in Berchtesgaden National Park. For yellow gentian is one of the most bitter medicinal herbs in the world, well suited for schnapps and as a general tonic.

programme.title: The Secret world of Herbs
programme.sub-title: The Secret world of Herbs - In the Balkans
programme.desc: In the pristine nature and mild climate of southeastern Europe grows a unique diversity of wild plants. Far removed from major industry and polluted soils, the Balkan countries have become the largest exporter of herbs in Europe. In Bulgaria alone, more than 300,000 people work with domestic plants. The business is becoming increasingly lucrative. The film takes us to the Croatian coast. On the Adriatic island of Cres, the audience meets Mladen DragoslaviÄ‡. In May, when the sage begins to blossom, this beekeeper has one month to produce his income for an entire year â€“ always with the goal of creating the best sage honey in the Balkans. Given a choice, the bees would never choose sage, for entering and exiting the narrow blossom is strenuous. Within three weeks, maximum, Mladen must remove his bees from the island. Otherwise they will die of exhaustion. In Skopje, the capital of Macedonia, the film visits Iva Yosifova. Hollyhock provides the raw material for her objects of art. The herb is medically beneficial, due to its mucilage, which is added to many cough tea mixtures. Iva, though, makes paper from hollyhock. Thanks to the herbâ€™s long fibres, the paper can be spread onto objects and modeled. The technique produces delicate sculptures, as fragile as nature.

programme.title: Cuckoo - The Enemy in My Nest
programme.desc: Itâ€™s no news that cuckoos are brood parasites: they lay their eggs into the nests of other bird species â€“ a clever trick that spares the rearing of own offspring. Some even go as far as to kill the other chicks in the nest. But why do other parent birds let this happen? Are they too stupid? Too inept? Or simply clueless? Admittedly, cuckooâ€™s eggs do look deceptively genuine. But the cuckoo chick? Not even remotely! It quickly grows into a giant that looks nothing like its new family. So why donâ€™t the adoptive parents notice the sham then? Until recently, the ornithologistsâ€™ theory was: the â€œvictimsâ€ have yet to learn to counteract. Turns out: they may even profit from having strangersâ€™ chicks in their nest! So is cuckooâ€™s behaviour a phenomenal trick or an evolutionary riddle?

programme.title: Beak & Brain - Genius Birds from Down Under
programme.desc: These child prodigies of the animal kingdom have feathers and beaks â€“ and very special skills! The Keas of New Zealand are the only parrots that live in snowy mountain areas. They like testing their brains, solving puzzles and challenging tourists: they unscrew bottle-tops, dismantle windscreen wiper blades and tear open rucksacks. They seem so determined youâ€™d think they have an understanding of physics and mechanics! Thousands of miles northwards, in New Caledonia, other birds have talent, too. Here bird expert Gavin Hunt discovered that crows are able to produce a whole set of tools, each designed for a particular purpose â€“ the most intricate tool culture in the animal kingdom! These high flyers compete against each other: Keas vs Crows. What is the secret of their intelligence? Itâ€™s the ultimate avian I.Q. test, with some funny and surprising results.

programme.title: King of the Mountains - Golden Eagle
programme.desc: Aerial shots of mating Golden eagles, a clash between a Golden and a White-tailed eagle, and an intimate glimpse into their nesting grounds combine to create a spectacular film. Tracking these majestic birds reveals the wild nature of their hunting grounds, showcasing the diverse animal and plant life that share their habitat with the 'king of the skies.' Viewers are brought up close as the eagle effortlessly glides over forests and canyons, abruptly diving in a breathtaking pursuit of prey. Witnessing these birds in their natural habitats is witnessing them at their finest. Embark on a magnificent journey through the skies and landscapes with us.

programme.title: King of the Seas - Sea Eagle
programme.desc: The times where eagles have been seen as varmints are over. They are now perceived as an integral part of the food cycle. Due to the fact that the habitats of the sea eagles in Germany are largely found in the north-eastern regions that are rich in water, the movie accompanies the eagles to an island, home to hundreds of sea ravens, where they rob the baby sea ravens of their food. They seem to always profit from the successes of the fellow creatures in their habitats. This film introduces you to the expert poachers of the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Snowy Owl: Queen of the North
programme.desc: No other owls are capable of surviving the extreme conditions, whereas the snowy owl is able to hunt through six months of bright sunshine and six months of twilight. This film follows a pair of snowy owls as they breed on the tundra of the High Arctic, 300 miles inside the Arctic Circle. Lemming numbers are low this year. Five owlets hatch and they face a struggle if any are going to survive.

programme.title: Crazy Creature Costumes
programme.desc: Animals shock us with the most bizarre appearances - some even look like they've been dressing up. But the weird and wonderful shapes and colours of nature are vital to the animals' lives. Sometimes they're disguised to help blend in, other times they are designed to stand out and show off. But whether it's a monkey in make-up or a salamander's toxic stripes, the weird and wonderful outfits enable the creature to thrive.

programme.title: Children of the Sun
programme.sub-title: Children of the Sun - Wild Bees
programme.desc: Most people associate honey producing insects with the name â€œBEEâ€œ. Few realize that there are over 560 different species of bees - most of them live their lives â€œbusy as a beeâ€œ but some â€œabuseâ€œ other insects and others are even known to be murderers. The film â€œWild Beesâ€ shows the incredible diversity and the stunning adaptations of our â€œBEESâ€ to various habitats and diverse living conditions. Fascinating fights, sensational performances, imposing structures and colorful individuals â€“ the world of â€œWild Beesâ€ offers all of this and more.

programme.title: Children of the Sun
programme.desc: Butterflies surely are the most fancied species inside the insect world. Their beautiful colouring and their graceful flight appeal to everyone. There are close to 4000 types of Butterflies â€“ today many of them are endangered due to the loss of their habitat.

programme.title: Missing Butterflies
programme.desc: Its miraculous transformation from caterpillar to remarkable winged beauty has been a point of constant intrigue. However, in the last few years, many have observed a decrease in the butterfly population. A much-discussed topic in the entomological society is the decline of the insect populace, but to what extent is this topic relevant to our beloved butterflies? For years, a teacher from lower Bavaria and a biologist from Munich have dedicated themselves to studying the butterfly and their presence in Bavaria. The results of their studies tell an enlightening story that is sure to entertain.

programme.title: Mantises - Masters of Deception
programme.desc: They are killers. They kill with unbelievable precision. They fight Kung Fu style and are seen in Japan as a symbol of vigilance - the mantises. Their triangular head with its unique flexibility is conspicuous. Two overdimensioned eyes fixate the distance to their prey rapidly and three-dimensionally. The chest segment of the mantis is prolonged and equipped with spiny appendages that can spear their prey as fast as a jack knife. The mysterious aura that surrounds the praying mantis has a lot to do with the fact that they are rarely seen. They have adapted to their surroundings perfectly. No matter whether leaves, blossoms, tree bark, sandy floors or even orchids - the mantis adjusts to all environments.

programme.title: Hummingbirds: Jewelled Messengers
programme.desc: Hummingbirds live at the limits of what is possible. They have the highest metabolism with a heart rate of 1,200 beats per minute of any vertebrate. Their wings beat 50 times a second. They can hover on the spot, and even fly backwards. To our eyes, they are just a blur. But with the aid of high-speed cameras we can slow down their hyperactive lives and look into their secret world.

programme.title: The Secret of Migrating Birds - Tryst at the Red Sea
programme.desc: Each year in spring, Israel witnesses a unique spectacle. Many millions of migrating birds cross the land bridge between Africa, Asia and Europe.Their first major roosting place after an exhausting nonstop flight over the African deserts is in southern Israel â€“ a vital stopover. Here they replenish their energy reserves. The flocks of migrating birds are pursued by flocks of ornithologists. Hundreds of birders flood into the port city of Eilat on the Red Sea to take part in the Migration Festival. For a week, Israel's southernmost coastal resort is home to international scientists and amateur birders.

programme.title: Down to Earth - Flightless Birds
programme.desc: Theyâ€™ve given up the wonderful art of flying. Or was it an art they never possessed? The brain structure and anatomy of flightless birds indicate that they descended from "flyers" â€“ so, why donâ€™t they fly?

programme.title: Penguin City - South Georgia
programme.desc: In the middle of the Antarctic Ocean, an entire mountain range arises from the water: South Georgia, the nursery of the Antarctic. Hundreds of thousands of penguins, elephant seals, fur seals and their young overcrowd the beaches. The rough weather and the extremely difficult access to the island cause filmmaking to be an endeavor requiring much of the film crew around Roland Gockel and Rosie Koch and the state of the art cameras. A lot of patience and sensitivity over a period spanning some five years now offers unknown and poignant insights into the life of the King Penguins on South Georgia Island

programme.title: Germany's Wild Birds
programme.desc: By monitoring ten interesting bird-watching locations, we document not only the silver herons in the Westerwald, but also the last great bustards in Havelland. Then there are the great crested grebes in their splendid plumages, shown building their nests and during courtship, in an area of extinct volcanoes: the Eiffel. Add to this, exotic wild birds and colorful parakeets, the newest members of the population in a park in Wiesbaden. We have resting migratory birds, ducks and waders on the west banks of the Steinhuder Lake. On the border to the Netherlands, in the moorlands near MÃ¼nster, we find the only wild flamingos in Germany. Equally interesting are the fire geese, avocets and many birds of the coastal region not far from Hamburg harbor. At Federsee Lake in Upper Swabia, we observe the inhabitants of the extensive reed zones: bearded tits. Then we have the birds of fortune, the cranes, which interrupt their long journeys by resting on the Baltic coast. Last, but not least, in the Feldberg lake region we accompany the ranger on an exciting sea eagle excursion. With this film, you are invited to experience a journey through the wonderful world of birds.
